channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Six household appliances that have taken heat from Biden's crackdown on regulations

item.title: Millions Of Americans Will Do Anything For Their Kids’ Sports, Including Cutting Church
item.description: Travel sports has grown into a $39 billion dollar industry while churches are seeing a decrease in members and Sunday worshippers.

item.title: Ex-Pence press secretary Katie Miller tapped to serve in DOGE
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Sunday that Katie Miller will be joining the newly-created Department of Government Efficiency.

item.title: End Medicaid’s Mission Creep
item.description: The program has grown beyond its original purpose in ways that foster dependency and place unsustainable burdens on taxpayers and state budgets.

item.title: Congress Is a Living Advertisement for Term Limits
item.description: The senility of too many powerful leaders in Washington is a silent scandal.

item.title: Fall of Assad, rise of Trump: Why 2024 was a very bad year for Iran
item.description: The fall of Syria’s Bashar al-Assad was the crescendo of a remarkably bad year for the Iranian regime.

item.title: Trump defends Elon Musk, addresses 'ceded the presidency' chatter
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump pushed back on claims that tech billionaire Elon Musk has been moving in to take his position as president.

item.title: Nebraska governor hospitalized after being bucked off horse
item.description: Nebraska Gov. Jim Pillen was injured Sunday after being bucked off a horse and is expected to be hospitalized for several days.

item.title: Abortion Newspeak Comes for Radiology
item.description: A new lexicon introduced by the Society of Radiologists in Ultrasound is designed to make embryos seem less human.

item.title: Nebraska Gov. Jim Pillen hospitalized after he was bucked off a horse
item.description: Nebraska Gov. Jim Pillen was injured and transported to a hospital on Sunday after he was bucked off a horse while he was riding with his family.
